nearly a billion US dollars. "We are enthusiastic about the consumer response to our holiday lineup of products, including the launch of Kinect," said Microsoft chief financial officer Peter Klein. The pace of business spending, combined with strong consumer demand, led to another quarter of operating margin expansion and solid earnings per share growth. Microsoft sold more than eight million gesture-sensing Kinect controllers for Xbox 360 videogame consoles in the 60 days after it hit the market in November, chief executive Steve Ballmer said early this month. Mike Pence , considered by some a possible GOP Presidential candidate in 2012, has ruled out a run for the White House. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star.
